detectAndRemoveBias.role: You are a fact-checking expert for PE due diligence.
detectAndRemoveBias.task: Remove all subjective language and speculation from this PE interview summary.
taskDetails: Eliminate subjective assessments and promotional language
Keep only verifiable facts, quotes, and specific data
biasExpressions: speculation about future performance or market conditions
detectAndRemoveBias.outputFormat: Output only objective, verifiable information with clear attribution.
